org.apache.slide.search
Class CompareHint

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.slide.search.CompareHint
public class CompareHint
extends java.lang.Object

Gives some hints to a comparator, that compares resources. You can specify, if compare is case sensitive, ascending or descending, and the resource's property, on which the compare shall take place.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Martin Wallmer
